doc.title: 1A Crispy Curry Puff: The original 1A is not the 1A you know!
doc.text: I/PRP am/VBP sure/JJ that/WDT when/WRB you/PRP see/VB this/DT type/NN of/IN multilayered/NN curry/NN puff/NN ,/, you/PRP would/MD immediately/RB think/VB of/IN 1A/NN curry/NN puffs/NN right/NN ?/. This/DT very/RB unique/JJ and/CC indeed/RB very/RB Singaporean/JJ snack/NN can/MD now/RB be/VB found/VBN in/IN many/JJ shopping/VBG centres/NN around/IN the/DT island/NN ./. But/CC did/VBD you/PRP know/VB that/WDT there/EX are/VBP really/RB two/CD 1A/NN curry/NN puffs/NN in/IN Singapore/NNP ?/. There/EX is/VBZ one/CD which/WDT operates/VBZ all/RB the/DT franchise/NN stalls/NNS in/IN Singapore/NNP ,/, then/RB there/RB is/VBZ another/DT one/CD which/WDT is/VBZ still/RB operated/VBD by/IN a/DT feisty/JJ old/JJ grandma/NN in/IN Henderson/NN ./. Guess/JJ which/WDT one/CD came/VBD first/JJ ?/. Update/DT 25/CD June/NN 2012/IN They/PRP have/VBP moved/VBN to/TO 好地方/VB Blk/NNP 127/NNP Kim/NNP Tian/NNP Road/NNP ,/, #/SYM 01-01/CD Singapore160127/NNS
